entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.1°C
Wind: S 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
